name: 傀儡の宿 - Kairai Inn
description:
Navigate through dangerous "kairai" while defeating them in this score-attack action game.

■ Kairai
A variety of unique "kairai" will appear. Defeat the kairai present in each area to earn points as you move through the levels!

■ Strategy
Players have access to items within the area and abilities that activate under certain conditions. By combining these with the appearance of the kairai in the area, strategize and explore the path to victory!

■ Other Features
・As you progress through the levels, more dangerous kairai will appear.
・Choose from 3 different modes.
・Select from 12 unique abilities.
・Encounter a diverse array of 19 different types of kairai.
